page.title: 08GIRL'S GAMES
page.content: This is one of the games we play at school it is called{skipping:}one girl stands at one end of the rope and another girl stands at the other end. One girl stands in the middle of the rope.The two girls holding the rope,twirls the rope and the girl in the middle jumps over the rope and thats how you play it. There is another game called{jumping {the planks.}Just jump over the planks one by one or two by two.Sometimes the the litle ones call it horses.There is a little plank a middle size plank and a big plank.We go up to the bank and run to the planks and do a sissor jump over the big one The little ones just run and do a normal jump.
